CLERIC SPELLCASTING

Full Spellcasters: Unlocks new spell level every 2 Cleric levels, up to level 6 spells. Cantrips: Starts with 3 Cantrips (gains additional cantrips at level 4 & 10) Spell Save DC: 8 + your Proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier Spell Attack Modifier: your Proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier Known Spells: Wisdom modifier + your Cleric level Spellcasting Type: "Prepared Casters" - Can change spell list freely when out of combat. Ritual Casting
